name: Gnomon
description:
Many hundreds of millenia ago, a powerful Djinn escaped from his realm, seeking a new world to devour.

The protectors of our realm, forseeing the evil intent of the otherworldly Djinn, constructed a magical sundial and four obelisks to keep him imprisoned in the void between worlds.

Generations of chosen warriors have kept the void seal intact, but it has become weak under the ravages of time and the ever growing power of the Djinn.

It is your task now.

Casting a magical orb into the sundial will delay his return, but only for so long. All four obelisks need to be repowered, and should imprison him long enough to vanquish him back to his own realm.

Controls: (supports controller)

WASD/Left Stick to move

Mouse/Right Stick to look

LMB/Right Trigger to fire an orb

I hope you enjoy!
